ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed policy synthesis for safe and efficient autonomous urban delivery.

bullets.item: Introduces zone- and time-based operational tiers with explicit safety KPIs.
Mandates incident transparency and public feedback loops.
Balances service throughput with pedestrian priority in sensitive areas.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Define red/orange/green safety zones with speed caps and curb-use rules.
Adopt dynamic routing to meet delivery SLAs under zone constraints.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Public trust risk mitigated by audit logs, incident reports, and opt-out streets.

check.note: Debate outputs align with trade-off evaluation.
